alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:57PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern McNairy and west central Hardin Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Adamsville, or 8 miles northeast of Selmer, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Selmer, Adamsville, Shiloh, McNairy, Crump, Bethel Springs, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Stantonville, Forty Forks, Good Hope, Pebble Hill, Old Lawton, Hurley, Purdy, Chambers, Hickory Flats, Mount Vinson and New Lawton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
